title: Spotify Notes Extension
description: A Google Chrome extension that lets users attach notes to songs on Spotify with real-time rendering, private/public settings, and caching logic.

title: Instagram Clone
description: A web application featuring client-side dynamic pages, real-time user interactions, and user authentication. Built with a RESTful API backend and a responsive frontend.

title: Fakebook
description: A Java application inspired by Facebook that runs SQL queries on a relational database and processes the results using custom data structures.

title: LC2K Assembler and Linker
description: An assembler, linker, and instruction-level simulator for the simplified LC2K ISA inspired by ARM to model real CPU behavior.

title: Piazza Post Classifier
description: A program that identifies the subject of Piazza posts by applying NLP and machine learning techniques.

title: Zookeeper Optimal Route Tracer
description: Implemented optimization algorithms (TSP, knapsack) to determine efficient feeding and routing schedules for zoo animals. Integrated farthest insertion heuristic, pruning, and distance caching.

title: Zombie Simulation Game
description: A simulation game modeling autonomous interactions between zombies and survivors. Designed using priority based on zombie distance and health for decision-making.

title: Treasure Hunt Route Tracer
description: Implemented breadth-first and depth-first search algorithms to simulate route tracing for finding treasure across varying terrains.

title: Euchre Card Game
description: A command line version of the beloved Michigan card game with AI opponents that use rule-based and strategic decision-making.

title: Image Resizer
description: An image resizer using the seam-carving algorithm, preserving key features by computing energy maps and removing low-importance seams. Focused on performance and memory efficiency with dynamic allocation.

title: Flappy Fish
description: An aquatic spinoff of Flappy Bird, with color customization, powerups, and dynamic object spawning!

title: Sepsis Prediction Model
description: During my internship at VinBrain, I created a machine learning model to predict sepsis in patients.

title: Eleckey
description: A self-service licensing key application I worked on during my semester with Inora Technologies.

title: Photographers' Favorites
description: A collection of favorite photos taken by the photography staff at the Michigan Daily.
